BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass a bill introduced by Senator Padavan S.3339 and Assembly Member Abbate Jr. A.6208, “AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to allowing certain correction members of the New York city employees’ retirement system to obtain retirement credit for period of child care leave.”
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: AN ACT, to allow certain correction members of the NYC employees' retirement system credit for child care leave

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Padavan, S.4067 and Assembly Member Abbatte, A.7021, “AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to accidental disability for certain members of the New York city employees’ retirement system or the New York city board of education retirement system”.
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: AN ACT, in relation to accidental disability for NYCERS abd NYCBOE retirement system

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Padavan, S.3934, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.6935, “AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the twenty-year retirement program established for members of the New York city employees’ retirement system employed as investigators by the district attorneys’ offices”.
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Twenty year retirement program established for those employed as investigators by the district attorneys' offices.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Padavan, S.3428, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.6943-A, “AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to additional member contributions by employees of the department of sanitation in cities having a population of one million or more”.
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: AN ACT, in relation to additional member contributions by employees of the department of sanitation in cities having a million or more

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Maltese, S.2177, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.4364, “AN ACT to amend the penal law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to deputy sheriffs in the city of New York”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: AN ACT, in relation to deputy sheriffs in NYC

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass a bill introduced by Senator Padavan S.3339 and Assembly Member Abbate Jr. A.6208, “AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to allowing certain correction members of the New York city employees’ retirement system to obtain retirement credit for period of child care leave.”
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this SLR be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
